Geekity

Projects by Andrew Shell

RT Proxy

RT Proxy is a simple tool to proxy RT requests (see A standard for RT'ing? to different social sites. I currently support Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, Google+, Delicious and Reddit.

Visit RT Proxy »

Unixtime

Utility to convert between unix timestamp and a formatted date/time string.

Visit Unixtime »

OPML to Evernote

Tool to allow publishing notes to evernote from an OPML document.
